#summary Myfaces 2.0

= What is? =

Myfaces is a framework for JSF. It´s a free software deployment.

= Instalation =

We must to add in pom.xml file of web level the dependencies of MyFaces 2.0

<dependency>
   <groupId>org.apache.myfaces.core</groupId>
   <artifactId>myfaces-api</artifactId>
   <version>2.0.0</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
   <groupId>org.apache.myfaces.core</groupId>
   <artifactId>myfaces-impl</artifactId>
   <version>2.0.0</version>
</dependency>

= Links =

http://myfaces.apache.org/core20/index.html
